question: 2 dreams - I dreamed that I was walking with my family in the street when a great fire (like Jahannum) was falling from the sky
answer:
QUESTION
Asalam alikum?# 1) I have been having dreams of my future life these past few years on which I can recall on right now. I remember on having a dream four years ago about a conversation I was having with a friend?.and guess what?I had the same exact conversation with my friend that I had in my dream a while ago?.does this mean anything? # 2) I sent in a dream that I had a while ago for you to tell me of its meaning a while back but I never got an interpretation of it?.I dreamed that I was walking with my family in the street when a great fire (like Jahannum) was falling from the sky onto us and when it was getting closer I started to cry and I kept on saying La Illah Illa Allah Mohammed Rasool Allah and the fire went away. What does this mean?
ANSWER


Share:
1. It is possible that a dream is made a reality.
2. The Kalimah, Dhikr and fulfilling the orders of Allah Ta'ala according to
the way shown to us by Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) are the only
ways of saving oneself from the fire of hell (Jahannum)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
